title: Part (a)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value 1) to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and 2) to score the response.

The response cannot contain more than one label as a response.

title: Part (b)(i)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value 1) to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and 2) to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate an example of a pioneer species, such as one of the species listed below.
The response indicates an example of a pioneer species, such as one of the species listed below.

title: Part (b)(ii)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value 1) to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and 2) to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate one of the roles of pioneer species in early succession listed below.
The response indicates one of the roles of pioneer species in early succession listed below.

title: Part (c)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value 1) to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and 2) to score the response.

The response explains, not just identifies, one adaptation that helps grasses succeed in grasslands.
descriptions: The response does not explain one of the following adaptations.
The response explains one of the following adaptations.

title: Part (d)(i)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value 1) to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and 2) to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not identify the independent variable in the study as being one of the following.
The response identifies the independent variable in the study as being one of the following.

title: Part (d)(ii)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value 1) to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and 2) to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not identify the dependent variable in the study as the growth of grass.
The response identifies the dependent variable in the study as the growth of grass.
